I am a graduate student in Computer Science at the [University of South Dakota](https://www.usd.edu/arts-and-sciences/computer-science/graduate). 
I have experience working as a Machine Learning Engineer focusing on Computer Vision and Natural Language Processing (NLP). 
I also have experience in Full Stack Software Development with Django as backend and Vuejs/React as Front-end.
